text: Pedro Luis Ronchino (18 June 1928 - 1 July 2020) was an Argentine Roman Catholic bishop. He was ordained to the priesthood in 1954. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Comodoro Rivadavia, Argentina, from 1993 until 2005.Diocese of Comodoro Rivadavia Ronchino died on 1 July 2020, aged 92.Bishop Pedro Luis Ronchino ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Argentine Roman Catholic bishops
title: Pedro Luis Ronchino
